# textarea-component



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property      | Attribute      | Description                                                         | Type                                | Default     |
| ------------- | -------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `cols`        | `cols`         | The number of columns that you would like to have in the component. | `number`                            | `30`        |
| `disabled`    | `disabled`     | If true, the component will be disabled.                            | `boolean`                           | `false`     |
| `error`       | `error`        | The error message when the component in the error state.            | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `helpfulText` | `helpful-text` | The helpful text of the field.                                      | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `label`       | `label`        | The label of the component.                                         | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `placeholder` | `placeholder`  | The placeholder of the component.                                   | `string`                            | `undefined` |
| `rows`        | `rows`         | The number of rows that you want to have in the component.          | `number`                            | `20`        |
| `state`       | `state`        | The state of the component that it is in.                           | `"default" \| "error" \| "success"` | `"default"` |
